indicator.summary: Moving Average Convergence/Divergence (MACD) is a simple oscillator view of two converging/diverging exponential moving averages. See documentation for more information.
indicator.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
indicator.param: Number of periods in the Fast EMA.
Number of periods in the Slow EMA.
Number of periods for the Signal moving average.
indicator.returns: Time series of MACD values, including MACD, Signal, and Histogram.
